Articles.Content: I'm not too sure about how you would go about it, but you may be able to recover G4Virus's videos if you used something such as the [internet archive](https://archive.org/). It allows you to go to old versions of webpages, and, therefore, potentially recover his videos. I'm not sure if this should go in discussion, so this can be moved if it is necessary.

Overfloater saved a few videos here.

[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0ZvL1WjqSwp_8QmIlNgRog](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0ZvL1WjqSwp_8QmIlNgRog)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-31T09:28:17Z" title="05/31/2015 09:28  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 31, 2015</time> by Fleb**
I love the song in the first video... Wish I knew what it was.
